nodes.text: The spouse of Teckla Minnau, handmaiden to Senator Padmé Amidala, was an aspiring writer during the rise of the New Order. The couple married following Minnau's return to her homeworld of Naboo upon Amidala's death.

Teckla Minnau's spouse was first mentioned in Teckla Minnau's StarWars.com Databank entry. During The Clone Wars: The Lost Missions, Minnau was killed in the episode "An Old Friend," which takes place prior to Minnau's return to Naboo and marriage to this individual. This information occupies a higher canon tier than the databank, nullifying the information about the marriage.[source?]
